mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exp, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS com, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS can FROM `reservation`

SELECT src.str_number, src.mb_id, src.str_name, src.str_tel, src.str_address, m.mb_email, COUNT(CASE WHEN rsv_cmt_delete=1 THEN 1 END) AS cnt, AVG(rsv_cmt_point) AS avg, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exp, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS com, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS can FROM `member` m RIGHT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT rc.*, s.mb_id, s.str_name, s.str_date, s.str_tel, s.str_address FROM `store` s LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT r.str_number, r.rsv_no, r.rsv_code, c.rsv_cmt_point, c.rsv_cmt_no, c.rsv_cmt_delete FROM `reservation` r LEFT OUTER JOIN `rsv_comment` c ON r.rsv_no=c.rsv_no) rc
ON s.str_number=rc.str_number)src
ON m.mb_id = src.mb_id GROUP BY src.str_number ORDER BY src.str_date DESC LIMIT #{page} , 9

SELECT c.rsv_cmt_no, c.rsv_cmt_content, c.rsv_cmt_point, c.rsv_cmt_writer, c.rsv_cmt_date, DATE_FORMAT(r.rsv_day, '%Y-%m-%d') AS rsv_day, c.rsv_no FROM `rsv_comment` c INNER JOIN `reservation` r ON c.rsv_no = r.rsv_no WHERE r.str_number=#{str_number} AND c.rsv_cmt_delete=1 ORDER BY c.rsv_cmt_no DESC LIMIT #{page} , 10
